name: Dachshund Through the Snow Christmas Card
description:
This listing is for a single 5x7 folded greeting card featuring my original illustration, Dachshund Through the Snow!

• Folded card, blank inside
• Card is 5" x 7"
• Printed on 130# matte card stock with a subtle non-glossy finish
• Comes with a white envelope

Want more than one? Buy 5 cards and save!

Please note that all monitors display colors differently and there will be minor color variations in your final product.

All artwork copyright © 2013 Erika Pitera | Hot Dog! Digital Pet Art. Sale of artwork does not transfer copyrights.

At this time, we only offer shipping in the U.S.

Unless otherwise noted, greeting cards will ship within 1-2 business days via USPS First Class Mail. You will receive USPS tracking information once your package ships, and it should arrive in 2-3 days.

Upgrade to USPS Priority Mail (arrives in 1-2 days) for $4.99 - just inquire at checkout and an invoice for the difference will be issued!

description:

name: Pet Sympathy Card - 5x5 - Dog and Cat Condolence Card
description:
Losing a pet is never easy. This elegant pet sympathy card is perfect to send to a grieving friend or family member who has recently lost a beloved dog or a cat. It features my original illustration: silhouettes of a dog and cat side by side on the moon against a starry night sky.

Front: "with sympathy"
Inside: "May the wonderful memories you've shared with your furever friend be remembered always and offer you peace in this time of sorrow. Sharing the sadness of your loss,"

The card measures 5" by 5" square when folded and is professionally printed on heavyweight 107# text stock pearl paper. Natural minerals and organic pigments give the paper a beautiful, pearl-like sheen. This listing is for one sympathy card with a matching white square envelope.

The back features the Hot Dog! Digital Pet Art logo.

Please note that all monitors display colors differently and there will be minor color variations in your final product.

All artwork copyright © 2013 Erika Pitera | Hot Dog! Digital Pet Art. Sale of artwork does not transfer copyrights.

name: Personalized Pop Pet Art - Metallic Print or Standout
description:
You can have any of our existing illustrations personalized with your pet's name and choice of background color!

The finished image is printed on gorgeous Kodak Endura Metallic paper and then mounted on your choice of 2mm black styrene or 3/4" deep foam core!

The metallic paper is a wonderful choice for modern décor because it has tack-sharp detail, rich saturated colors and a pearlescent finish that offers an almost 3D effect.

Metallic Print Mounted on Styrene:

Styrene is a smooth black plastic that measures 2mm thick. Mounted prints don't need to be framed - you can display them directly on your walls with mounting adhesives!

Metallic Standout:

Metallic standouts are metallic prints mounted on 3/4" thick lightweight foam core. The edges are a finished black, and the back of the standout has 4 pre-drilled holes for easy hanging. The great thing about standouts is that they stand up on their own, so you can display your art on a shelf or mantle, too.

After purchase, please click here to send an email with the following information:

  • Which illustration you'd like personalized (choose any design from the website or blog)
  • Pet's name as you'd like it to appear (or if you don't want a name, just let me know)
  • List the specific color you want for the background from the Color Chart (see image #3 above)
  • You'll receive a digital proof within 48 hours. Once you've approved it, your metallic print or standout will be professionally printed at our trusted labs and shipped to you! Please allow 2 weeks after approval to receive the final product.

Other Details:

  • Since this is customized artwork, I will not accept returns.
  • Please note that all monitors display colors differently and there will be minor color variations in your final product.
  • All artwork copyright © 2013 Erika Pitera | Hot Dog! Digital Pet Art. Sale of artwork does not transfer copyrights.

Free shipping in the US!

name: Custom Pop Pet Art - Metallic Print or Standout
description:
Commission a custom digital illustration of your favorite furry friends! These metallic pieces will really wow your friends and family!

Every illustration is hand-drawn in Adobe Illustrator based on your favorite photos.

The finished image is printed on gorgeous Kodak Endura Metallic paper and then mounted on your choice of 2mm black styrene or 3/4" deep foam core!

The metallic paper is a wonderful choice for modern décor because it has tack-sharp detail, rich saturated colors and a pearlescent finish that offers an almost 3D effect.

Metallic Print Mounted on Styrene:

Styrene is a smooth black plastic that measures 2mm thick. Mounted prints don't need to be framed - you can display them directly on your walls with mounting adhesives!

Metallic Standout:

Metallic standouts are metallic prints mounted on 3/4" thick lightweight foam core. The edges are a finished black, and the back of the standout has 4 pre-drilled holes for easy hanging. The great thing about standouts is that they stand up on their own, so you can display your art on a shelf or mantle, too.

If you prefer a more classic look for your art, check out our Gallery Wrapped Canvas options!

If you'd like to include more than one pet in your commissioned art, please purchase the upgrade separately ($75 per pet within one illustration).

The order process:

  • First, purchase this listing in the size you desire!
  • Next, send me as many photos as possible at erika@hotdogpetart.com. For more details about the photos you should send, click here.
  • Tell me a little about your pet's personality. Also, tell me what kind of background you'd like - any color preferences, etc. Basic backgrounds with solid colors and shapes are included. More elaborate environmental backgrounds are an upgrade of $50.
  • You will receive a digital proof within 1 to 2 weeks.
  • After reviewing the proof, you'll have one opportunity to request any small revisions.
  • Upon approval of the final proof, your print or canvas will be made!
  • From start to finish, you should have your custom artwork within 2-4 weeks.

For more details on the custom commission process, please click here.

Free shipping in the US!

name: Custom Pop Pet Art - Gallery Wrapped Canvas
description:
Commission a custom digital illustration of your favorite furry friends!

Every illustration is hand-drawn in Adobe Illustrator based on your favorite photos.

The finished image is then printed on beautiful art canvas! Each gallery wrapped canvas is 1-1/4" deep and arrives ready to hang with pre-installed hardware.

Gallery Wrapped Canvas:

The canvas features durable construction, tucked corners and a clean finished back. Produced at one of our most trusted labs, your artist canvas is printed with pigment-based inks for true color and exceptional fade resistance. It's then finished off with a clear acrylic coating that provides a protective layer and a slight satin luster.

If you prefer a more unique, modern look for your art, check out our Metallic Print or Standout options!

If you'd like to include more than one pet in your commissioned art, please purchase the upgrade separately ($75 per pet within one illustration).

The order process:

  • First, purchase this listing in the size you desire!
  • Next, send me as many photos as possible at erika@hotdogpetart.com. For more details about the photos you should send, click here.
  • Tell me a little about your pet's personality. Also, tell me what kind of background you'd like - any color preferences, etc. Basic backgrounds with solid colors and shapes are included. More elaborate environmental backgrounds are an upgrade of $50.
  • You will receive a digital proof within 1 to 2 weeks.
  • After reviewing the proof, you'll have one opportunity to request any small revisions.
  • Upon approval of the final proof, your print or canvas will be made!
  • From start to finish, you should have your custom artwork within 2-4 weeks.

For more details on the custom commission process, please click here.

Free shipping in the US!

name: Gift Certificate
description:
Don't know what to choose? Get one of our gift certificates!

We offer gift certificates in a variety of denominations, and you can choose to have it delivered via email or via postal mail.

We have two cat designs and two dog designs - yours will be chosen at random unless you specify your preference.

Free shipping!

name: Add-On - Jewelry
description:
Jeweled Pearls Necklace

A 34" dyed pearl and black cord necklace in beautiful jewel tones. A large 1-1/4” 100% sterling silver circle pendant on a small hinged sterling silver enhancer adds the finishing and unique touch. The small enhancer also allows the pendant to be easily removed to wear on other necklaces.

Cable Link Charm Bracelet

This charming 7-1/2” 100% sterling silver bracelet is extremely comfortable because it is so lightweight. The chain has oval links that have a slight rope texture. It comes with our pewter Camyrn charm with the swirl back. Additional Camyrn charms can also be ordered for a full charm bracelet look. Please inquire for pricing.

Camryn Necklace

This small 1/2” square lead-free pewter silver plated pendant has a swirled back that gives it personality. It comes on a beautiful, yet simple, sterling silver 18” snake chain.

Lauren Necklace

The Lauren necklace includes two photo charms and a silver heart charm. The heart photo charm is 1 1/16" x 2 2/16" and the small square charm is 1/2" x 1/2". The 18" small textured cable chain features a large textured cable chain insert with a garnet colored bead.

Please note: This listing does not include a custom illustration and must be purchased in addition to your Custom Pop Pet Art.

Ships free in the US with your custom pop pet art!

name: Add-On - iPhone 4/4s Case
description:
Dress up your iPhone 4/4s with a custom case featuring your pet! The case is clear plastic and the back is printed with your pop pet art in either vertical or horizontal orientation (solid black on the inside).

Please note: This listing does not include a custom illustration and must be purchased in addition to your Custom Pop Pet Art.

Ships free in the US with your custom pop pet art!

name: Upgrade - Additional Pets
description:
Would you like to include more than one pet in your custom artwork? Purchase this upgrade!

Please note: This applies to one finished product.
